SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface MemoryWarningService.Listener

Enclosing interface:
MemoryWarningService
public static interface MemoryWarningService.Listener

A listener that can be used with the low memory warning service to receive notifications of low memory conditions on one or more Java memory pools. Once notified the listener will not be notified again until the usage has fallen below the threshold and then exceeds it again, if memory usage recovery is not enabled. If enabled memory usage recovery will be reported on, and then low memory usage will be notified again when applicable.

Method Summary
 void memoryUsageLow(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo, MemoryUsageRecoverySettings usageRecoverySettings)
          Called when a Java memory pool exceeds the threshold set by the memory warning system.
 void memoryUsageNotRecovered(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo)
          Called when a Java memory pool was unable to recover memory within the number of specified GCs or within the specified time-frame.
 void memoryUsageRecovered(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo)
          Called when a Java memory pool has supported memory recovery usage and has recovered memory.
 

Method Detail

memoryUsageLow

void memoryUsageLow(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo,
                    MemoryUsageRecoverySettings usageRecoverySettings)
Called when a Java memory pool exceeds the threshold set by the memory warning system. This function will not be called again until the usage has fallen below the threshold and exceeds it again, if memory usage recovery is not enabled. If memory usage recovery is enabled, it will be reported on first, and then low memory usage will be notified again when applicable.

Parameters:
usageInfo - The memory usage information for a memory pool
usageRecoverySettings - specifies the settings for detecting memory recovery, null if memory usage recovery is unsupported for the memory pool. If not null and not enabled then usage recovery usage is not tracked

memoryUsageNotRecovered

void memoryUsageNotRecovered(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo)
Called when a Java memory pool was unable to recover memory within the number of specified GCs or within the specified time-frame. This notification is only sent after an initial memoryUsageLow(MemoryPoolUsageInfo, MemoryUsageRecoverySettings) and the memory usage recovery was enabled.

Parameters:
usageInfo - The memory usage information for a memory pool

memoryUsageRecovered

void memoryUsageRecovered(MemoryPoolUsageInfo usageInfo)
Called when a Java memory pool has supported memory recovery usage and has recovered memory. This notification is only sent after an initial memoryUsageLow(MemoryPoolUsageInfo, MemoryUsageRecoverySettings) and the memory usage recovery was enabled.

Parameters:
usageInfo - The memory usage information for a memory pool
